name: By the Pier
description:
A fishing game for the Playdate made by SquidGodDev and Goodgis! How fast you swing your Playdate determines how far your line goes!

Crank to reel in the line and watch out for your tension and time to make sure you don't snap your fishing line before you fully reel in the fish.

Relax and try to catch all the fish! Replay to try and catch the biggest fish you can!

Check out how I made this game here:

Check out how the art was made for this game here:
